body_html:
Ok, so the issue is the one input as 2.5GB while the result requires another 2.5GB memory. Got that.
But, I'm a little confused why the following code still gives OOM error.

temp2 = tf.reshape(temp1, [5000, 5000, 25])
temp2 -= A # if remove this line, sess.run(temp2) execute successfully, otherwise fails.
sess.run(temp2)

body:
Ok, so the issue is the one input as 2.5GB while the result requires another 2.5GB memory. Got that.
But, I'm a little confused why the following code still gives OOM error.

``` python
temp2 = tf.reshape(temp1, [5000, 5000, 25])
temp2 -= A # if remove this line, sess.run(temp2) execute successfully, otherwise fails.
sess.run(temp2)
```
